generic:link.msg:message: "Total Limits Sanctioned" =(Funded Limits Sanctioned +Non- Funded Limits Sanctioned)
"Total Provision"= (Provisions Held at Branch + Provisions Held at Head Office + Interest Suspense)
"Total Limits Sanctioned" =(Funded Limits Sanctioned +Non- Funded Limits Sanctioned)
"Total Provision"= (Provisions Held at Branch + Provisions Held at Head Office + Interest Suspense)
"Total Provision"= (Provisions Held at Branch + Provisions Held at Head Office + Interest Suspense)
"Total Provision"= (Provisions Held at Branch + Provisions Held at Head Office + Interest Suspense)
"Shortfall" = (Provision required to be held by regulatory authority) -(Total Provisions)
"Shortfall" = (Provision required to be held by regulatory authority) -(Total Provisions)
"Gross Total" = (Total Customers Credit of US $2 million and above) + (Total of Customers Credit Less than US $2 million)
Value for "Total" should be sum total of all "Customers Credit of US $2 million and above".
"Shortfall" = (Provision required to be held by regulatory authority) -(Total Provisions)
"Shortfall" = (Provision required to be held by regulatory authority) -(Total Provisions)
"Gross Total" = (Total Customers Credit of US $1 million and above) + (Total of Customers Credit Less than US $1 million)
Value for "Total" should be sum total of all "Customers Credit of US $1 million and above".
